## About me

Welcome to my website! My name is Wayne, and I am a first year master's degree student studying  Biostatistics at Columbia's Mailman School of Public Health. In 2021, I graduated from the University of California, Berkeley with a bachelor's degree in Mathematics and Statistics. From 2021 to 2023, I worked as a data scientist at First Republic Bank's anti-money laundering program. From 2023 to 2024, I worked on JP Morgan's CCOR Analytics team, focusing on cloud computing risks.
